root.name: Sharin no Kuni, Yuukyuu no Shounenshoujo
root.description: A sequel to Sharin no Kuni, Himawari no Shoujo. This visual novel contains 6 stories. One detailing the backstory of the previous game's main antagonist Houzuki Masaomi, four extended epilogues for the previous game's heroines, and one bonus story.
